title: Himi 301
lyrics:
7’s
1.
’Eiki Sīsū ofa mai,
Ki hoku laumālie
He ‘oku ou kei vaivai,
Mo loto manavahē.
2.
He ‘oku ou ongo’i ni,
‘A ‘eku kovi lahi,
‘Eiki, fakamo’ui,
‘A hoku laumālie.
3.
Mo ke faka’ilo mai,
Ki hoku loto holi;
Ho hala ke hao ai,
‘A hoku laumalie.
4.
Pea u tui mo’oni,
‘Aki hoku loto ni;
Pea u tonuhia ai,
Pea u fiemālie.
5.
Pea u fiefia ai,
‘I he’eku ongo’i
Kuo ke fakahaofi,
‘A hoku laumalie. *
